name: .EV3E File Extension
summary: Learn about .EV3E files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An EV3E file is an experiment by LEGO MINDSTORMS EV3, an application that enables you to build and program LEGO MINDSTORMS EV3 robots. It contains information about an experiment users load onto an EV3 Brick to test LEGO robots, such as configuration settings (e.g., experiment duration, data-loggin intervals from sensors, and the sensors to collect data from). EV3E files are included in .EV3E projects.

content: LEGO MINDSTORMS EV3 allows you to conduct experiments with LEGO robots via the EV3 Brick. You can perform the experiments in real-time through a connected EV3 Brick or load an experiment onto the EV3 Brick to conduct remote experiments.
NOTE: To create an experiment (then save it as an EV3E file), select File → New Project → Experiment.

instructions: You can open EV3E files with the LEGO MINDSTORMS EV3 (Home and Education versions) in Windows or macOS. For example, to open an EV3E file, select File → Add Experiment.

To view EV3E files in a project, click the wrench icon at the top-left of the Project screen in the application. You can also click Import at the bottom of the window to open EV3E files from this screen.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
